name: HH_ADMN_PAT_DATA
description: Contains Home Health Admin task data for individual patient contacts.

columns.name: EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the administration record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient.  Links to table PATIENT.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.  Links to table PAT_ENC.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: Entry in the Admin task Comments field for the contact.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: Visit start time for encounter-based admin data.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: Visit end time for encounter-based admin data.

columns.name: DRIVING_START_TIME
columns.description: Driving start time for encounter-based admin data.

columns.name: DRIVING_END_TIME
columns.description: Driving end time for encounter-based admin data.
